A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Lots of risks were taken in The Last Jedi and it pays off! Great addition to the Star Wars saga! Luke may be a broken jedi\, but when the time comes... He will do what needs to be done to help his friends and sister! 

The weakest part was the casino stuff. Thankfully it doesnt last that long! 

The best part\, IMO\, was Luke's entire arc. Unexpected but so satisfying!
